Class PacManController

    • ui.PacManController

extends java.lang.Object
    Laboratorio unidad 3
    Author:
    César Canales
    Universidad Icesi

    • Constructor Detail

      • PacManController

        public PacManController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This function is called after the game has been loaded and it is responsible of creating the graphical user interface components to show the PacMans on screen. It also creates a PacManThread and a MouthAnimationThread for each of the PacMans.

      • mainGame

        public void mainGame()
        This function is called when all the PacMans have been caught and it is responsible of interacting with the user in order to save scores and continue to the next level if there is one.

      • animateMouth

        public void animateMouth(javafx.scene.shape.Arc pacman,
                         int open)
        This function is responsible of animating the opening and closing animation of the PacMan's mouth.
        Parameters:
        pacman - The arc representing the PacMan.
        open - An integer representing how much of the mouth has to be opened at the time.

      • movePacman

        public void movePacman(javafx.scene.shape.Circle eye,
                       javafx.scene.shape.Arc pacman,
                       PacManSprite ps)
        This function is responsible of moving the PacMan depending on it's direction. It handles the moment when the PacMan bounces with the walls or with other PacMans.
        Parameters:
        eye - The circle representing the eye of the PacMan.
        pacman - The arc representing the PacMan.
        ps - The PacManSprite that is associated with this specific PacMan.

      • isTouchingOtherSprite

        public boolean isTouchingOtherSprite(javafx.scene.shape.Arc pacman)
        This function tells whether or not this PacMan is touching another one anywhere on the screen. If it is, it changes the direction of the other PacMan that is touching and returns true.
        Parameters:
        pacman - The arc representing the PacMan.
        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether or not this PacMan is touching another PacMan.

      • showHallOfFame

        public void showHallOfFame()
        This function fills the score grid and shows it, represents the top scores in the game.

      • aboutTheGame

        public void aboutTheGame()
        This function shows information about the game on screen when the menu option is clicked.

      • onCloseRequest

        public void onCloseRequest()
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function deactivates all the threads currently running. It's called when the user exits the game or clicks the "X" on the top right corner.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread has interrupted the current thread.

      • getGameBackGround

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getGameBackGround()
        This function obtains the main game background.
        Returns:
        The main game background.

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()
        This function obtains the main game that is currently being played.
        Returns:
        The main game that is currently being played.

      • setStage

        public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        This function modifies the controller's stage.
        Parameters:
        stage - The new stage.
